data.title: NRK agrees deal with WSC Sports to deliver Euro 2020 highlights
data.meta_description: NRK Sport, the sports division of Norwegian public broadcaster NRK, has agreed a deal with artificial intelligence company WSC Sports to deliver automated real…
data.text:
NRK Sport, the sports division of Norwegian public broadcaster NRK, has agreed a deal with artificial intelligence company WSC Sports to deliver automated real-time highlights of its coverage of the forthcoming Uefa Euro 2020 tournament.
